reviews.text: Friendly staff, nice food. We had a banquet for 7 people with a pile of beers. Loads of well prepared, tasty food and reasonably priced as well.
Really nice surroundings lovely friendly staff and great food.  Brilliant value for money.  Well worth a visit.
Fantastic food and friendly service. Only place that has good aromatic crispy duck. They make some great food.
Would give zero stars if possible. Food was terrible, and the service was even worse! Avoid like the plague.
Remember that You have to pay extra money for rice. Beef was... lets say "good" and the service really nice.

My 1st visit beautiful auditorium saw
EQUUS brilliant play, my friends said I wouldn't enjoy it but I loved it excellent acting.
One down point when actors were at back of stage it was a job to here what  they were saying and I was only in j5.
Went to The Greatest Shwoman Sing a long. It was lovely being able to go to something there at a reasonable price. Hope they do more of these. Ice creams are pricey though.
Lovely theatre. Seats better than most. Handy restaurants nearby

A great place to experience theatre, good acoustics, friendly staff and a really nice ambiance. 
The seating can be a bit cramped and access along the rows not easy, but the plus side is you can be really close to the stage and even at the rear of the stalls you are closer than in many west end top price seats. 
There is a restaurant and bars for pre-theatre food and drinks in subterranean surroundings (the old vaults), while these places have a great atmosphere they are totally impractical for disabled guests as all involve steps with no lifts  - yes I know the age and style of the building is a limitation but I would think at least one of the areas would be accessible?
Lovely theatre. Disabled access via a lift however the door sticks. Limited female loos so queues during the interval. Drinks and ice creams on the expensive side.
Very nice staff and the food was excellent. Didn't take long to arrive and was hot and fresh. Pretty consistent ordering at Pizza Express. There is a takeaway option also if you need to dash.
Very good pizza. Perfect service. I will come back for sure ;).
Such good food! At first it looks like a fast food restaurant but the food is really good quality and tasty!
Good pizza, slow service.
Delicious food. Friendly, helpful staff.

Extremely poor. Very dated and tired restaurant. Bread came out and was stale.. hard as a rock. Food was greasy and just overall not appealing. Service was equally poor.. had to ask five people for the check, had multiple people ask for our order.. the restaurant wasn’t busy and somehow they managed to make things extremely complicated. Very very disappointed with the horrible food and poor service. Won’t be back

Paradiso is our family's go to place. We like their Sunday brunch and we have enjoyed their musical acts over many years. Their pizza is wood fired and delicious. Good consistent service and the food quality is very good.
The staff was considerate. Wide choice of menu items. Food was so fresh and came out fast! Full of flavor.
Had our school's annual staff appreciation dinner here. Great food and great service! Will return...
Nice place. Kid friendly space with the adjoining adult room. Good reliable place for Italian comfort food.

Good range of books and an ambience to indulge in thumbing the eye catching titles, with a good spread of gadgetry and toys. Surprising to see decline in the range offered in diaries and calendars while a rise in generic stationary items. Highly trending in non fiction titles is another aspect of 2019 at landmark books arena.. Very encouraging changes in layout of stores, so that one feels like spending time there.

One of the best places to go to if you're a person who just loves spending your time amongst books. They have the perfect collection of books.. books of all categories.. also a comic book haven for comic book fans. They have a dedicated section when people can read books too. 
Apart from books, they have a wide collection of toys for children as well as action figures for collectibles and enthusiasts. 
Fashion accessories, unique forms of diaries, office supplies, bags, mugs, and chocolates are some of the other things that can be found here.

I had been to Landmark which is in Forum, it has developed over a timeframe as far as inside and quality also. Milestone is one stop arrangement on the off chance that you are a book significant other. You have all the assortment of books running from anecdotal, magazines, recorded, instructive and so forth. They have great assortment of books for children too, I like the flawless story books for them.

The games activity is likewise great and contains all the fundamental necessities for all the game. We had purchased a cycle from that point, the conveyance for which was entirely quick. A dazzling spot for book significant others.

Nice place to find books..... And you also get cute stuffs... Not to mention the toy section.... Oh boy!!! .... Doesn't matter how old I get, I will always go in there to check out those cute stuffed toys and marvel avenger figures!!

The shop is good. The collection of books and games is good ( online price is much cheaper). But the staff is untrained. They asked me debit card pin stating ATM machine under charging instead of asking cash as alternative. They did not serviced me to another queue for payment. The payment processing takes more than 30 minutes in queue. Very slow staff.
It is really spacious and airy. You can find different kind of events during the whole week. The only common point of these events are that they are all high quality events that you can enjoy a lot.
Love the venue and the events they organise, not too  enamoured with their drinks prices. We paid about 50 liras for a bottle of Bomonti and a non-alcoholic ginger ale!
Nice place ! Not very willing stuff / very rude the guys who kept our coats !!! Especially towards tourists

Went for the golden oldies new year's party..it was lovely. Highly recommended..just wish they played more popular dance songs... especially around the count down ...some of the songs are popular..but not very exciting to dance to. Still..a good night! Happy 2018! 😃
Perfect place to enjoy a night with friends... You can choose having a dinner in any of its restaurants, a quick snack with local beer and a good alternative concert in Babylon...all in One

After getting to know them better, I eat at least once per month at Tokyo Japanese Restaurant. The service is absolutely impecable, the food is great, and the quality is constant. You never get bad sushi, bad soup, or soggy tempura. The awesome fish selection, availability of Japanese beverages and the care and dedication towards the food and the customer makes me want to go there again and again.

I've been visiting this restaurant every once in a while for years. Today the service and quality of the food were amazing, as always (I didn't realize I hadn't left a review until now). 

This is one of the (unfortunately) very rare places I know of in Cluj where I am confident I won't be let down when I return, and that's why I prefer Tokyo over other places for special moments.

I've become more and more appreciative of places that are able to offer the same great food and service constantly, irrespective of the time of year or how busy the restaurant is. 

I've been to Tokyo on quiet afternoons or on days when every table was booked and I noticed no difference in the experience - and that's just one of the things I love about this restaurant.

The food tastes amazing, in particular the seafood is well prepared and always fresh, and you can have sakuramochi for desert! 

The menu is varied and can offer a great experience of Japanese cuisine. It's even possible to order dishes consisting of smaller portions of various entrees and deserts, a really nice idea for those of us who have a hard time deciding what to order.

The staff are always ready to offer a smile and good advice, and they seem to know everything there is to know about the menu.

The atmosphere is intimate and quiet, with airy rooms that take your mind off the cluttered city, and the music is soothing and not too loud. I've noticed people tend to speak in hushed tones, and that can be a welcome change from the usual types of places where you need to raise your voice over the music and over the voices of people at other tables, but you do need to be in the mood for it.

There is more I could say about Tokyo, but it's probably better to visit them and discover for yourselves a place that strives to offer perfection in the smallest details, and, at least in my opinion, achieves it.

Thank you for a wonderful evening and for the care and attention to details you always spoil us with.

It was my first time for my friends and me in this restaurant. The service is amazing. You are being greeted by everyone with a nice smile. The woman at the reception kindly took our luggages and kept for the time being there.
The waitress was also very polite and helped us with the menu. She also knew what dishes were vegan and/or gluten-free. 
The food was very very good and we didn't wait so long for it.
If I am ever going back to Cluj, I will definitely go back to this restaurant!

Awesome food and service. The person who served us was very nice and hospitable.
I find the design of the restaurant quite boring.

Taste and quality of the Sushi was really nice. The service very welcoming and discrete.
Only thing I would recommend is to improve the presentation and arrangement of the food
Average to high priced. All food options I've tried over the years have been tasty. Good at fixing order when asked. Atmosphere most of the time relaxing to chilled fun

Went with another couple for St. Patrick's Day drinks and food. Nice cold Guinness, but the Irish stew was soupy, and the soda bread was a hard cold puck. I know it was a special but it could have been better. There was live music, and that was nice. We might go back to see what the regular menu is like.

I had the French Onion soup which was simply delicious.  I'm allergic to MSG so don't often get to enough soups when eating out.  There's is completely homemade and very delicious.   Service was great, friendly,  knowledgeable, and when my hubby's stuffed chicken was taking little longer to cook than normal, they provided an update.  Hubby thought the size of the chicken breast was a little small for his liking but it would have been fine for me.  For main I had the bacon and apple cider spinach salad.  My only suggestion here is order the dressing on the side if you like a lighter touch with the dressing.

Awesome pub style bar, old factory converted into bar gives modern industrial feel. The crowds are always a good mix of hip and mature folks making for a pretty good time. They have live entertainment and so far it has not disappointed, although some bands get very loud. The vibe is always upbeat and the service is friendly. 
Usually a pretty busy place come the weekend but worth a visit for the experience.
5 stars for a one of a kind bar experience!

Was here for a baby shower. The staff were attentive and made sure everyone always had beverages. Wish you recycled, as everything from the party went to the garbage. Great variety for the lunch buffet.
Good.
Hostel ini sudah tutup. Entah diperbaiki atau tutup untuk selamanya.
非常棒的青旅!

Quick stop for some "fro-yo". There were many choices of yogurt and also toppings. The price was very reasonable, especially when you give the 11 year old free reign to make his own sundae. Very clean inside, would go back.

It's a Nicholson's pub, quite easy to miss (you need to duck under an archway with a doorway somewhat hidden to the side that drops you down a staircase to a cellar dwelling.

Met up with some family friends for dinner who recommended this place; we were shown to a table deep inside the premises and decided to opt for pies. The meal was good, beer fine (a mixture of Nicholson's own and some other guest beers) and service excellent.  I decided to try a pudding, cheesecake with a generous dollop of cream.

The total bill for 4 people for meals plus plenty of beers came to under £100 - excellent value for what we had. Will definitely return if I'm in the area.
Wonderful place. Fabulous premises, great food and brilliant staff. Couldn't have been better and cannot wait to go there again.

Lovely little hideaway with a great atmosphere and eclectic clientele. A good range of reasonably priced wines and ales to suit any taste. Bar staff are polite and helpful. Wheelchair access through a lift

Always a fun place to dine out. Standard pub F&B. Great atmosphere on Friday night. Very busy. Unusual decor too. Reservations recommended. Private parties can take over a larger than usual space so you've been warned! ;-). Good service and happy waiting staff. Thank you. See you again.

An unusual themed bar with so much potential. Great gin selection but if it isn't on the menu,, they can't do cocktails. Interesting Roman meets Egyptian theme but in need of a clean. Thick dust on the light shade over our table, cobwebs on the curtains. A real shame as it could be a great location.
